content.rendered:
Speakers, details, early-bird registration, and more are all now live for the 2018 Brand New Conference in New York, NY, on September 13 – 14.

A few things:

  • Early-bird pricing will only be available for two months, ending on June 28.
  • Between speakers, sponsor-reserved tickets, and pre-sale registrants there are already 438 seats taken and there are only 915 seats available so we encourage you to not leave your purchase until the last minute because we are cautiously, optimistically, expecting to sell out.
  • An explanation of this year’s distorted identity can be found here.

Hope to see many of you there.

Many thanks to a wonderful set of sponsors: Sappi, School of Visual Arts – MPS in Branding, Domtar, Monotype, MOO, Hoefler & Co., Colorplan presented by Legion, Frere-Jones Type, MailChimp, Classic Color, Type Supply, Commercial Type, and Scout Books.
